attributes.action: Make St George's Day a public holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The 23rd April aka St Georges Day should be made a public bank holiday in England. This will then give us English our own day as the Scottish, Welsh and Irish all have their own days, whereas we do not. This will give us a sense of being and we will have finally shown that we can be English as well as British.

So by signing this petition you are showing your support and are saying that you want this day made a public bank holiday.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
